product_name: YETI Basket for Tundra 50 and 65 Cooler
long_description: Keep your food cold without submerging it in melting ice-this YETI Basket fits in the YETI Tundra 50 and 65 coolers, providing an easy way to organize food and beverages. Coated steel construction is lightweight and durable. Please note YETI Tundra Coolers come with 1 basket; this item acts as an additional or replacement basket.
short_description: Keep your food cold without submerging it in melting ice-this YETI Basket fits in the YETI Tundra 50 and 65 coolers, providing an easy way to organize food and beverages.
